review: It must be said, if you're someone who values gameplay time per dollar spent, then you may want to wait for this game to go on special.Short play time aside, this game is another masterpiece from Playdead. Intuitive controls and light puzzle solving play out on a background of intrigue and mystery. Inside's setting and atmosphere is quite different to Limbo which I found refreshing. There also are some new gameplay mechanics introduced which add to the puzzle solving mix.There is some limited replay value, but for many this will be a single play through.
